Step 1: All students must set up their application user profile in the user profile section of the app.
Step 2: Prior to attending a lecture all students must use the location check-in section of the application to scan a QR code upon entering and leaving a class.
Step 3: Before attending a class, all students must submit a picture of themselves wearing a mask in compliance with the Queen Mary COVID-16 health guidelines. Students must also use hand sanitizer before and after attending a class. To do this, each student must scan a QR code placed next to and automatic sanitizer station.
Symptom Checker: If at any point you feel like you may have COVID-19, please open the symptom checker part of the application. Please answer all questions honestly and this will provide you with guidance.
Exposure Notification: If you have been exposed to another student who has tested positive for COVID-19 you will be notified in the Exposure Notification section of the application, this will provide you with next steps according to your exposure notification status.
